remarks: Existence of an existentially restricted class abstraction. ` ph ` is normally has free-variable parameters ` x ` and ` y ` .  See also ~ abrexex .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2004.)
statement:
abrexex2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
abrexex2.2 $e |- { y | ph } e. _V $.
abrexex2 $p |- { y | E. x e. A ph } e. _V $.
$d A x y $.
